DOC.brief_title: Fetal Copeptin After Oxytocin Challenge Test
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Vaginal delivery evoke dramatic surge stress hormone facilitate transition infant extra-uterine life . Infants born elective cesarean section ( C-section ) know high risk compromise birth adaptation . Labor vital vaginal delivery trigger fetal stress hormone release . Fetal plasma copeptin , surrogate marker arginine vasopressin , find 100 1000-fold increase vaginal delivery compare elective C-section . However , relationship labor intensity fetal stress hormone release largely unknown . Objective : The purpose study determine fetal copeptin newborn deliver C-section mother oxytocin challenge test ( OCT ) prior birth compare without OCT. Protocol : Pregnant woman term eligible participate uterine contraction report within last 24 hour contraction record cardiotocogram 30 minute . Further inclusion exclusion criterion see . After write informed consent , participant get infusion line participant receive OCT placebo . The OCT standardize follow : 5 IE Syntocinon ( oxytocin ) 500 mL Ringer , infusion rate begin 12 ml/h increase step additional 12 ml/h three contraction within ten minute record . Subsequently , infusion stop . The placebo Ringer infusion without Syntocinon . C-section do 1 3 hour OCT placebo arterial umbilical cord blood collect birth . Maternal newborn data record within first day birth , include maternal blood loss , neonatal adaptation , postnatal weight loss .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Singleton pregnancy Gestational age 36 week No contraction report within last 24 hour No contraction record 30 min cardiotocogram prior oxytocin challenge test Exclusion criterion : All contraindication labor , include placenta praevia Serious fetal malformation Anhydramnios Oligohydramnios IUGR < 5. percentile Presence contraction Suspicious pathological fetal heart rate tracing ( cardiotocogram ) Any clinical biochemical sign maternal infection Breech presentation More 1 Csection history
